concept.title: Non-normative references
concept.shortdesc: Non-normative references are references to external documents or resources that implementers of DITA might find useful.

dlentry.dd: ISO/TC 154, Data elements and interchange formats—Information interchange—Representation of dates and times, 3rd edition, http://www.iso.org/iso/catalogue_detail?csnumber=40874, 12 December 2004.
